resources.string: Save recent numbers/messages.\n(disabling it will clear saved ones)
Removes leading zeros from the prefix and number
Hide the help text from the main screen
Restore prefix %s when the app closes
Open automatically when a number is autofilled(share, call, recent or clipboard)

This app uses WhatsApp public api to open a chat with any number you enter. No contact is created on the device. 
 More info here. 

Insert the number and the prefix with no extra characters, only numbers 0-9. More info here. You can click on the territory button to choose from a list. 
Example: for +44 (UK) 123 456 7890 write 441234567890
Use this to create a link that will open WhatsApp when clciked. You can specify a number and/or a message that will be placed on the input box (will NOT, i repeat ,will NOT send the message).
Message that will be autocompleted, NOT sent.

With this option you can delete all this data (settings, resents, etc) and restore the default behaviour. Useful to test if app stopped working due to wrong configuration. This is equivalent to uninstalling+reinstalling the app.

Do you want to DELETE ALL THIS DATA of the app?

This app will close. Next time you open it'll behave as a fresh install.
